activities: Through its website Seekbooks.co.uk,  SeekMedia.Com, Inc. operates an online bookstore. The personal information we collect from our customers is necessary to allow us to ship the books they order, to process payment through the customer's credit card, and to notify the customer of the status of their order. We do not collect this information for any other purpose and we do not release this information to anyone other than necessary to fulfill the orders we receive.
eucountries: Ireland, Austria, Italy, Belgium, Luxembourg, Denmark, Netherlands, Finland, Portugal, France, Spain, Germany, Sweden, Greece, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We are committed to cooperate with Data Protection Authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
